overview:
Create an original guidebook by collecting your favorite places in your Habitat, organize them by folders and share them with friends by sending them a folder.

If you have a lot of good restaurants, cafés or other spots worth visiting you want to recommend to your friends, finding and sending information about each one individually can be quite a lot of work. Habitat can really help you out here. Send a whole folder of places you have already gathered in your personal habitat to your friends with a single tap. That includes all the important information about the place like comments, pictures and a map.

Collect your favorite spots and those your friends sent you in your “My Habitat” to make a unique, one-of-a-kind guide book.

Main Features:

  • My Habitat: A collection of your favorite spots
  • Folders: Organize places in your habitat by topic, mood, location or anything else
  • Send Folders: Quickly send a whole collection of places to your friends
  • Comments: Add your voice to places
  • Photostream: Add your pictures to places
  • Activities: Check out what your friends are up to
  • Maps: Get an overview of your habitat on the map
  • Twitter and Facebook integration: Share new places you add on Twitter or Facebook

• Website: http://habit.at • App Store URL:http://itunes.apple.com/en/app/habitat/id424539961?mt=8http://itunes.apple.com/en/app/habitat/id424539961?mt=8 • YouTube (English): http://youtu.be/LPXTTZvy_Sk
